sect1.title: Build Variables
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific variables for the compiler and linkers:

screen.userinput: export CC="${LFS_TARGET}-gcc" export CXX="${LFS_TARGET}-g++" export AR="${LFS_TARGET}-ar" export RANLIB="${LFS_TARGET}-ranlib" export LD="${LFS_TARGET}-ld"

sect1.para: Lets add the build variables to ~/.bashrc to prevent issues if we stop and come back later:

screen.userinput: echo export CC=\""${LFS_TARGET}-gcc\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export CXX=\""${LFS_TARGET}-g++\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export AR=\""${LFS_TARGET}-ar\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export RANLIB=\""${LFS_TARGET}-ranlib\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export LD=\""${LFS_TARGET}-ld\"" >> ~/.bashrc
